system.effect: Allows the Vessel to enter and exit the immaterium. Reduce Base Travel time for warp journeys by 1d5 days per full week of travel. If voyage is shorter than 1 week before reduction, has no effect. Can be further modified by results of Navigation (Warp) Tests.

description.value: Allows the Vessel to enter and exit the immaterium. Reduce Base Travel time for warp journeys by 1d5 days per full week of travel. If voyage is shorter than 1 week before reduction, has no effect. Can be further modified by results of Navigation (Warp) Tests.
